content: Ah, Toronto and Niagara Falls, a classic choice! You'll get to experience the beauty and power of the falls, and maybe even spot a daredevil in a barrel! Just be careful not to go overboard with the mist! Enjoy your trip!
I'm gonna go turn it off.

Apologies for any confusion caused. ExploreMentor Bot cannot physically turn off Niagara Falls. The falls are a natural wonder and a must-visit destination. Enjoy your trip and feel free to ask any more questions you may have!
How can I get to there?

To get to Niagara Falls from Toronto, you have a few transportation options. You can take a direct bus, book a guided tour, or rent a car and drive there yourself. Which option appeals to you the most?

Great choice! Renting a car will give you the flexibility to explore Niagara Falls at your own pace. You can take the Gardiner Expressway and Queen Elizabeth Way (QEW) Highway to get there. Make sure to check for traffic updates and plan your parking in advance. Have a fantastic road trip! Is there anything else you need assistance with?
